segments.text: I feel a wave of anger rising within me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so completely unaware of her surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is flooding the entire kitchen, for goodness sake!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, yet she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children are performing a dangerous balancing act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just irresponsible, really, all of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should be paying attention to these risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for accidents here is enormous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm frustrated by the sheer negligence displayed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This isn't a peaceful domestic scene; it's an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me want to shout and get their attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of awareness is truly infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR
